Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Jar stand
Description: Jar stand, made of a very hard clay, with a very wide beaded rim around both extremities. These beaded rims are painted with a red decorative motif, a simple stripe on the edge and lines radiating toward the inside on the upper section.
